m_szDocTitle: Network Rail electrifies station car parks | Next Green Car
m_szDocSumamry: clear all 4.7.2013Network Rail electrifies station car parks ChargePoint Services and Network Rail have today announced the installation of an eight vehicle electric charging facility at its public car parks at Euston and Victoria railway stations in central London. The installation is part of Network Rail's on-going sustainability strategy, which aims to make commuting via the rail network the greenest way to travel. ChargePoint Services worked alongside Network Rail to help develop this initiative and install a solution to meet Network Rail's specific EV charging requirements. The solution i
